name: Paint Arena
description:
THE GAME

Paint Arena is a first-person shooter multiplayer 3D game where the players would need to fight opposing players to gain their colored blood and paint the city as fast as possible. These players are foreign with each other as their kind has been enemies for a long time due to the area and resources dispute and differences. To win, each player must color the city as fast as possible. 


PLAYERS

Players fight opposing players to gain more colors and must fight back to prevent losing. Players have weapons they can utilize to win the game. 

WEAPON & SPRAY CANS

The players can hit each other with the naginata (なぎなた, 薙刀) which is a pole weapon sharp enough to gain colored blood from opposing players. 

The players each have their spray cans where the converted spray-colored blood was from the opposing enemy's colored blood to their color. Use this to paint the city. 


HOW TO PLAY THE GAME

  • Race by covering the city with colored blood
  • Fight opposing players
  • Keep health protected to prevent losing

HOW TO INSTALL THE GAME

  • Install/Download the ZIP file below
  • Extract the ZIP file
  • Run 'PaintArena.exe'

THE FUTURE PLANS AHEAD
